amendment.description: To increase the appropriation for the distance learning and telemedicine program, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1161 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1161 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6312) To increase the appropriation for the distance learning and telemedicine program, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1161 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1161 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rosen to Amendment SA 948.
